Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: allaah ke naam se jo bada krpaalu aur atyant dayaavaan hain.
prashansa allaah hee ke lie hain jo saare sansaar ka rab hain
badala die jaane ke din ka maalik hain
ham teree bandagee karate hain aur tujhee se madad maangate hain
un logon ke maarg par jo tere krpaapaatr hue, jo na prakop ke bhaagee hue aur na pathabhrasht
